short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Twitch View Bot | Twitch Viewer Bot

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Twitch View Bot | Twitch Viewer Bot | Twitch Viewbot

The Twitch View Bot allows users to enter a Twitch Channel ID and URL and generate twitch stream codes. Using the viewer bot code use can share their Twitch content with a large audience which will help increase twitch views.
